snippet: On Free Comic Book Day, anyone who walks into a participating store will find more than 50 titles up for grabs, and sometimes artists making special appearances.
abstract: Free Comic Book Day, annual effort that began in 2002 to promote the comic-book industry, is intended to shift focus from blockbuster movies and television back to the printed page; list of participating stores around New York City.
lead_paragraph: On Free Comic Book Day, anyone who walks into a participating store will find more than 50 titles up for grabs, and sometimes artists making special appearances.

headline.main: Archie Isn’t Dead. He’s Free. (For One Day.)
headline.print_headline: Archie Isn’t Dead. He’s Free. (For One Day.)
